test.name: Caso de teste 01 - Acesso ao Menu "Eletronicos"

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (125.0.6422.141) detected in PATH at C:\Users\JesMat\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python312\Scripts\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (126.0.6478.114); currently, chromedriver 126.0.6478.63 is recommended for chrome 126.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
